title: Bug 17289 - Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus.
OB: The focus caret should be in the first Combo 'Host:' when clicking on it.
EB: The focus caret is not in the first Combo 'Host:' when clicking on it.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog and press 'Tab'. The focus should go to the second Combo 'Repository Path:' instead of the first Combo 'Host:'.
